about.title: Who are we?
about.subtitle: Mada Chaland is a travel agency based in Madagascar, specialized in tailor-made tours across the island. Our mission is to provide you with unforgettable, authentic, and safe journeys. We work with experienced local guides and carefully select quality accommodations to ensure your comfort throughout your stay.

authentic.title: Authentic Travel
authentic.description: Unique experiences with local guides to discover the real Madagascar

safe.title: Safe Travel
safe.description: Quality accommodations and personalized support for your safety

responsible.title: Responsible Travel
responsible.description: Support for local communities and preservation of the environment

features.conclusion: We believe in responsible travel and make it a priority to support local communities and environmental preservation.

hero.title: Welcome to Mada Chaland
hero.subtitle: Your travel agency in Madagascar
hero.description: Explore Madagascar differently, with tailor-made tours, unique experiences and personalized support.
hero.longDescription: At Mada Chaland, we offer tailor-made trips to discover Madagascar in all its splendor. Whether you are passionate about nature, paradise beaches, wildlife or local culture, we have tours adapted to your desires and budget.

tours.title: Our tours and experiences
tours.description: Discover Madagascar at your own pace with our tailor-made tours: beaches, adventures, nature, unique wildlife and cultural discoveries. Each tour can be customized according to your desires, budget and length of stay.

book.title: Book your trip
book.subtitle: Easily book your tour with Mada Chaland. Enter your dates, the number of people, and your preferences, and we will suggest a tailor-made itinerary.
